summary:
I got tired of converting XWM to wav using the command prompt so I made a much faster GUI Alternative to convert them.

Please note that the XWM files HAVE to be on the desktop for some reason it doesn't work in any other directory than the desktop.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]I got tired of converting XWM to wav using the command prompt so I made a much faster GUI Alternative to convert them.

[color=gold]I was messing with the program and found that the directories don't have to be on the destop it can be anywhere as long as theirs no spaces in between instead of spaces put underscores. Look at the pic below[/color]
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56891-1-1407717331.png[/img][/center]
[center][/center]
Please note that the XWM files HAVE to be on the desktop for some reason it doesn't work in any other directory than the desktop. 

Also both the Exe files have to be in the same directory for this to work.

Can Install anywhere.

[Change Log]
        [Version 1.0 Alpha]
            - Intitial Release
            - Only XWM Converter
        [Version 1.0 Beta]
            - Added the ability to convert Wav to XWM files
        [Version 1.0]
            - Added ability do optionally delete the source file after you convert it (its a button)
            - Added the ability to close all the hidden CMD Windows while in the program to reduce memory usage
            - Now if you press the "Exit" Button on the "Choose One" Dialog the program will close as normal and will close all the CMD windows on exit
[center][/center]
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
